{"id":400564001,"lang":"java","time":"9 months, 1 week","timestamp":1601041558,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/400564001/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Bits","memory":"39 MB","code":"public class Solution {\n    // you need treat n as an unsigned value\n    public int reverseBits(int n) {\n\n        int ans = 0;\n        int count = 0;\n        while (n != 0) {\n            ans <<= 1;\n            ans = ans | (n & 1);\n            n = n >>> 1;\n            count++;\n        }\n        for (int i = count; i < 32; i++) ans <<= 1;\n        return ans;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-bits"}
